subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: After watching their teammate Kevin Ware break his right leg in the first half, the top-seeded Cardinals regrouped and then dismantled second-seeded Duke in the second half.
snippet: After watching their teammate Kevin Ware break his right leg in the first half, the top-seeded Cardinals regrouped and then dismantled second-seeded Duke in the second half.
